title: To the Kings most Excellent Majesty. The humble petition of the gentry, ministers, free-holders, and other inhabitants of the county of York assembled by His Majesties speciall summons at Heworth Moore neere the City of Yorke, on Friday the third of Iune, 1642.
publicationStmtPublisher: for Edward Blackmore, at the signe of the Angel in Pauls Church-yard,
